About Me

Do you know me?

BIO

I am a highly motivated and quick-learning fullstack web development student with a pleasant personality and attitude. I have problem solving skills and I love to take new challenges. I also love technology and I am passionated to get best out of myself in web development and design.

I am seeking a training place or a web-development place in an IT company, where I get an opportunity to gain further experience and upgrade my skills and knowledge.

Business College Helsinki

2013-2018

Courseworks: Water Treatment Technology / Soil & Groundwater Pollution Technology / Environmental Legislation & BAT / LCA / Sustainable Urban Planning / Waste Treatment Technology / Matlab / R / SolidWorks / GIS and so on.

I was responsible for repair and maintenance of computers and its peripherals. I also did computer networking for the office.

2010-2012

As an assistant-Logistic Executive, I had to inspect all incoming and outgoing stocks. I also partly assisted auditor in annual auditing. I was also assigned duty to train the new employees (to use accounting-logistic software).

Internee - Assistant Environmental Officer

2017-2017

My duty was to collect environmental baseline data of project infrastructures, analyse the data at project level, compile them and finally report it to the team leader. I have been a part of EIA team for many projects (hotels, buildings, highways, and so on)
